name: swap
description: Swaps source amount of source token for destination token on the same chain.

chainName.description: The ID of the blockchain chain where the token swap will occur.

sourceAmount.description: The amount of tokens to be swapped from the sourceToken.

sourceToken.description: The token to be swapped from.

destinationToken.description: The token to be received in the swap.

name: bridge
description: Bridges tokens between different blockchain networks by transferring amount of token from source chain to destination chain.

sourceChainName.description: The ID of the source blockchain chain.

destinationChainName.description: The ID of the destination blockchain chain.

token.description: The token to be transferred from the source chain to the destination chain.

amount.description: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

name: transfer
description: Transfers tokens to another address on the same chain.

amount.description: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

recipient.description: The recipient's address for the token transfer.

chainName.description: The ID of the blockchain chain where the token transfer will occur.

name: token-balance
description: Retrieves the user's balance of a specific token on a given chain.

chainName.description: The ID of the blockchain where the token is located.

tokenName.description: The name of the token whose balance is requested.
